gender: male | female | other | Rather Not Say

socialProfiles.platform: My Website | facebook | instagram | twitter | snapchat | youtube | quora | blog | github | behance | dribble | linkedin | wikipedia | other
socialProfiles.link: url text /*note : any platform can be linked only once*/

education.level: School | High School | Junior College | Degree College | Post Graduation | Diploma | Ph.D | Certification/Professional Courses
education.current: true | false | not applicable if endYear is mentioned(i.e if current is true, endYear must be null)
education.scoreUnits: Percent(decimal input) | Grade(Alphabetical input only capital) | Grade Points(decimal input) | Class(should have only 3 oftions 1st, 2nd & 3rd)
education.score: Text can consist digits or Text based on scoreUnits
education.stream: Text , applicable only from Junior college level

wrkExprnc.workDscrptn: text description of the nature of job
wrkExprnc.current: true | false | not applicable if endDate is mentioned(i.e if current is true, endDate must be null)

projects.title: text title of the project
projects.stream: text generalised line of work involved in the project
projects.year: YYYY Year when project was undertaken
projects.projUrl: url link of the project website or resources or products
projects.organisation: text name of the related organiztion/publisher if any(optional)
